org.transitime.db.structs

Class VectorWithHeading

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Vector
      • org.transitime.db.structs.VectorWithHeading
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VectorWithHeading
extends Vector
    Inherits from Vector but automatically calculates the heading. Useful for if heading is frequently used.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • VectorWithHeading

        public VectorWithHeading(Location l1,
                 Location l2)
        Construct a vector and determine its heading. Heading will be between -180 and 180 degrees.
        Parameters:
        l1 -
        l2 -

    • Method Detail

      • getHeading

        public float getHeading()
        Returns:
        Heading in degrees clockwise from due North. Note that this is not the same as the "angle" which is degrees clockwise from the equator. The value is calculated in the constructor so that this method is efficient if the heading is retrieved multiple times for a vector.

      • headingOK

        public boolean headingOK(float vehicleHeading,
                float allowableDelta)
        Returns true if heading is within allowableDelta of segment.
        Parameters:
        vehicleHeading - Heading of vehicle. If Float.NaN then method will return true
        allowableDelta -
        Returns:
        Whether heading is within allowableDelta of segment

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Vector
